titles.title: Glory and Honor and Praise, O Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
F
Glory and honor and praise, O Lord, belong to Thee.
Blessings ten thousand times o'er be Thine eternally.
Perfect are all of Thy works and ways, and e'er shall be,
Glory be unto Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
What condescension that Thou shouldst come,
O Lord, to earth,
clothed in the flesh of Thy only Son of matchless worth.
In Him on Calv'ry didst reconcile us to Thyself,
Glory be unto Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And by Thy wonderful grace Thy children now are we.
O to become grown up sons of full maturity;
living to take now Thy kingdom in the heavenlies,
and Glory give to Thee!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O for the day of Christ's revelation, full, complete!
Then shall the Christ, Head and Body joined,
stand on His feet.
And in this Christ, earth shall see Thy victory complete,
and Glory give to Thee.
